attributes.action: Stop Energy Exploration in the Artic
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned what a law passing that the UK Government will not be involved in the exploration and annihilation of the Arctic Circle for energy supply and demand. This land area is vital in the controlling Climate Change and any damage here would be irreversible. So the Government should be stopping and nit helping in this abomination to our plant and should invest more in Green Energy.
